performance_metrics.name: Wafer Throughput (WPH)
performance_metrics.description: Number of wafers processed per hour. This is a primary metric reflecting overall equipment effectiveness. Higher throughput generally correlates with lower unit costs.

performance_metrics.name: Wafer Yield
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of wafers successfully processed without critical defects. Critical defects include those affecting electrical performance or structural integrity.

performance_metrics.name: Defect Density (per wafer)
performance_metrics.description: Number of defects per square millimeter on the wafer surface. Lower density indicates higher quality processing. Categorized by severity (critical, major, minor).

performance_metrics.name: Cycle Time (per wafer)
performance_metrics.description: Time taken to complete a single processing step. Optimized through process control and automation.

performance_metrics.name: Equipment Uptime
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of time the equipment is available for operation. Primarily determined by maintenance schedules and component reliability.

performance_metrics.name: Process Stability (Sigma)
performance_metrics.description: Standard deviation of key process parameters (e.g., etch rate, deposition time). Lower sigma indicates greater process control and repeatability.

implementation_requirements.name: Robotic Handling System
implementation_requirements.specifications: 6-Axis Robotic Arm, Payload: 15-30 kg, Repeatability: ± 0.02 mm, Workspace: 1.5-2.5 m
implementation_requirements.description: Required for precise wafer positioning and handling during various processing steps.

implementation_requirements.name: Automated Chemical Delivery System
implementation_requirements.specifications: Precision Pumps: ± 0.1% accuracy, Flow Rate Range: 1-100 mL/min, Material Compatibility: Stainless Steel 316L
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures consistent chemical delivery for etching, cleaning, and deposition processes.

implementation_requirements.name: Cleanroom Environment
implementation_requirements.specifications: Class ISO 8 or better, Humidity Control: 40-60%, Temperature Control: 22-25°C
implementation_requirements.description: Critical for minimizing contamination and maintaining wafer integrity.

implementation_requirements.name: Process Control System (PCS)
implementation_requirements.specifications: Real-time Monitoring, Statistical Process Control (SPC), Integration with MES/ERP, Data Logging Capacity: 100 GB/day
implementation_requirements.description: Centralized system for monitoring, controlling, and optimizing all process parameters.

implementation_requirements.name: WAFER TEMPERATURE MONITORING
implementation_requirements.description: Precise temperature control crucial for deposition and etching processes.

implementation_requirements.name: Vision Inspection System
implementation_requirements.specifications: Resolution: 1280 x 1024 pixels, Frame Rate: 60 Hz, Detection Range: 50-100 mm

operational_considerations: Preventative Maintenance Schedules (based on equipment hours)
Operator Training (advanced process control and troubleshooting)
Waste Management and Chemical Recycling Programs
Contamination Control Protocols – rigorous documented procedures

input.system_message: You are an AI assistant specialized in industrial engineering and specifications. For the given topic, provide a comprehensive overview of industrial/commercial specifications including performance metrics and implementation requirements. Be precise with numerical values and include ranges where appropriate. Focus on practical technical details that would be relevant to professionals in the field.
input.user_message:
Create detailed industrial specifications for: Semiconductor Fabrication Automation

Format your response as a JSON object with these categories:
1. performance_metrics: An array of metrics with names, values/ranges, and descriptions
2. implementation_requirements: An array of requirements with names, specifications, and descriptions
3. industry_standards: An array of relevant standards and certifications
4. key_suppliers: An array of major equipment/technology suppliers for this industry
5. operational_considerations: An array of important operational factors

Please provide realistic values for industrial/commercial scale implementations.

Return ONLY valid JSON without any additional text, explanation, or code block formatting.
